title: High-efficiency nickel recovery from spent electroless nickel plating solution: effective degradation of high-concentration nickel complexes to form a nickel ferrite nanomaterial via Fe3O4 catalytic oxidation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,900-910
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00876B, Paper
Kaibin Lu, Jiemin Qin, Meihua Hu, Limeng Hu, Minlin Mao, Xiaoqin Li, Zhang Lin, Weizhen Liu
High-concentration organic nickel complexes were efficiently degraded and converted into NiFe2O4 nanomaterials via Fe3O4 catalytic oxidation under alkaline conditions, with high removal efficiency of nickel (99.99%) and TOC (81.94%), respectively.
